definition: "Redology", academic field devoted to the study of A Dream of Red Mansions

sentences.english: The tragedy of love between Jia Baoyu and Lin Daiyu is a great interest to the lovers of "Hong Xue"(study of A Dream of Red Mansions).
sentences.chinese: 寶黛愛情悲劇是“紅學”愛好者最爲關注的一個問題。

sentences.english: The construction of the theory plays an important role in the building of the discipline system of Redology.
sentences.chinese: 學科理論之建構，也是紅學學科體系建設的重要課題。

sentences.english: Therefore, laying stress on the text of The Dream of Red Mansion is the appropriate approach of study.
sentences.chinese: 迴歸文本，纔是紅學研究的正確學術道路。

sentences.english: New Red Chamber Dream studies are more or less in the path of textual research.
sentences.chinese: 新紅學差不多走了一條考證的道路。

sentences.english: The Redology is one of famous social science in the Chinese cultural history of the 20th century.
sentences.chinese: “紅學”是二十世紀中國文化史中的顯學之一。

sentences.english: China appeared the " red the house of enzymology" of many researches 《 Red Chamber Dream 》 .
sentences.chinese: 中國出現了許多研究《紅樓夢》的“紅學家”。

sentences.english: New Hongxue" is essentially composed of the union of positivism approach and true records."
sentences.chinese: “新紅學”的基本構成是“實證與實錄合一”。

sentences.english: Cao Xueqin s father is Cao Yong or Cao Fu, the Hong studies up to now did not have the solution.
sentences.chinese: 曹雪芹的父親到底是曹顒還是曹頫，紅學界迄今無解。

sentences.english: There are sorts of problems in current Hongloumeng science study.
sentences.chinese: 當前“紅學”存在種種問題。

definition: methodology/Discours de la méthode by René Descartes 笛卡兒|笛卡儿[Di2 ka3 er2], 1637
to elucidate/to expound/to study and explain
